ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader creates seamless textures.
Setup:
- Shuffle: rotate the incoming image to create new patterns - Detail: Zoom in / out of the pattern - Smoothness: smooth the overlapping parts
Demo clip: https://vimeo.com/119640186
Shader developer: Inigo Quilez
Based on https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4tsGzf
